thread.title: Malaysia Airlines Ushers in Hari Raya with FITRAHTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Malaysia Airlines Ushers in Hari Raya with FITRAHTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Malaysia Airlines Ushers in Hari Raya with FITRAHTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Malaysia Airlines Ushers in Hari Raya with FITRAH Published on : Thursday, July 16, 2015
Malaysia Airlines on Sunday, released its Hari Raya short film called FITRAH, which encourages Malaysians to cherish the moment and always look forward to a better tomorrow.
FITRAH serves as a reminder of how transient life is and to appreciate the beauty in the moments we have with each other. It is in these transitory moments of happiness and sadness, good and bad, in light and in darkness, that we find hope for a better tomorrow.
FITRAH is a prequel to TERBANG and BLESSINGS, the third instalment in a series of short films entitled ‘A Malaysian Story’, the airline’s social media campaign.
In many similarities, this short film depicts the transition Malaysia Airlines is under, and with changes, it offers the arrival of something better, both internally and for its guests.
In just two days since its first showing on 12 July, FITRAH has gained more than 100,000 views.
Malaysia Airlines would like to take this opportunity to wish all its guests Selamat Hari Raya, Maaf Zahir dan Batin.
The airline would also like to remind passengers to check-in early during the festive season to avoid congestion at the Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA).
Passengers may check-in 48-hours prior to their flight via web check-in or MHmobile check-in.
Alternatively, passengers may also utilize the Self Check-in kiosks which are available at KLIA.
Source:- Malaysia Airlines
